title: Colombia extends ceasefire with ELN
description:
Colombia’s government and ELN guerrillas announced the extension of a ceasefire that seeks to facilitate ongoing peace talks. The six-month ceasefire was announced minutes before the end of the initial…

title: Pressure on Colombia’s Supreme Court to pick new chief prosecutor
description:
Labor unions and political organizations close to Colombia’s President Gustavo Petro announced protests to demand the Supreme Court pick a new chief prosecutor. Teachers union Fecode said it will take…
